DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind , randomize pilot clinical trial prescreen estimate 250 potential subject , consent evaluate approximately 100 potential subject , ultimately enroll 70 subject ensure 40 subject provide primary marijuana reduction outcome measure four week post quit date . Subjects stratify sex randomize one two treatment group ( n=20 per drug group , 50 % female ) : progesterone ( PRO ; 200mg 2x/day ) Placebo ( PBO ) . Telephone screen visit invitation ( 20 minute ) lead consent process in-person screen include medical-psychiatric evaluation inclusion/exclusion ( two visit , two hour ) , randomization medication start ( 7 day ) , stable medication ( 28 day ) medication reduction final evaluation ( 7 day ) .
